summary: A tribute to the Congolese people, who despite desperate poverty, a history of oppression and an ongoing civil war that has killed nearly 4 million people, continue to be sustained by music.
cast: Wendo Kolosoy|Mbinga Kabata|Antoine Moundanda|Joseph Munange|Mukubuele Nzoku|Aminata Panda|Alphonse Biolo Batilangandi|Michel Vula Diankatu|Willy Nzofu Makonzo|Albert Emina|Nlandu Milandu|Tonda Pembele|Bolakofo Esio|Andulu Mbula|Tshieba Mubanga|Ekembe Mumpele|Buanga Nzinga|Bilowa Tujibikile
title: On the Rhumba River
